ExpressionSetConstraintObj.name: ExpressionSetConstraintObj
ExpressionSetConstraintObj.description: Represents the association between a Product object and the constraint model tags defined in a given constraint model.

ConstraintModelTag.description: The product tag that is defined in the constraint model, for example, Laptop.

ConstraintModelTagType.description: The type of the product tag that is defined in the constraint model.

ExpressionSetId.description: The expression set associated with the expression set constraint object.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but didnâ€™t view it.

Name.description: The name of the expression set constraint.

ReferenceObjectId.description: The object associated with the expression set constraint object.
